attributes.review: First mistake was that it took two weeks to download! Then when I opened the app I had a very orange man say he’d EAT ME! Omg I got so scared! While I was using it the music it played had attracted spiders that ate my small cat! I’m deadly afraid of spiders! A day later the big orange ugly man came to my house and nearly KILLED ME until my big dog ate him!
attributes.title: I nearly DIEDDD!!!

attributes.review: When I got the app I noticed that my phone was acting weird and after a day or two I noticed that my cloud was completely blank all of my memories gone and then it got ahold of my credit card and took 5 grand before I could put a hold on it THIS APP IS A ViRUS.
attributes.title: Don’t get this app!!!!

attributes.review: When I opened the app this rat came out of nowhere and dropped kicked me and said we don’t support people who are horrible he proceeded to bring his rat gang friends and they took my phone and now they are holding me hostage so that I could right this someone call my mom I’m scared 🙃✨
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: Not only did this app take forever to download, but it crashes all of the time to the point where I cannot even bring myself to explore its contents. Additionally, the app cursed me and my entire family. Do NOT download. 0/10 would never recommend to any friend. 😡
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review:
this app brought viruses to my phone and my family’s phones, i don’t suggest getting it. as
soon as i opened the app it glitches out and deleted everything off my phone i tried to go into the app again and it showed me a picture of donald trumps nudes🤢🤮🤢. DO NOT GET THIS APP
attributes.title: Awful app

attributes.review: this app makes ur phone crash😿 and it makes my phone shut down every time i open it🙀 it’s annoying and you should never download it. i don’t see da point of this app honestly just a waste of storage🤯🤯anyways... #BLACKLIVESMATTER #ACAB don’t support this racist stupid orange cheeto looking perv 😏😏😜😝🚫🏃🏃🏃
attributes.title: don’t download this app😁❤️😾❌

attributes.review: this ridiculous app took five hours to download on my quality wifi. and when i finally opened the it started screaming this awful high pitch noise that attracting thousands of roaches. the app won’t close i’m stuck listening to this screeching and my house is swarming with so many bugs! this app is awful! absolutely terrible! if i could give it zero stars i would! i can’t even support my president because it’s just screeching an ear piercing noise! do not download this app?
attributes.title: the worst possible app ever🧚🏽‍♀️✨

attributes.review: When you open the app for the first time a creepy face pops up. You know like one of the faces that you would find in a van that is trying to kidnap little kids. The app takes forever to download and is useless.
attributes.title: What a terrible app it almost killed me

attributes.review: I hate to say it but as president of America, I expected a better app! This app was not user friendly at all!!! I had to get my husband to try to figure it out (since he’s a tech nerd) for me and even he couldn’t seem to do it!!! I officially hate Trump. Make it better😚
attributes.title: worst app on the market🧐

attributes.review: It's such a bad app my phone kept lagging & freezing. I would unlock my phone & it still wouldn't let me in my phone, i had to undate my sim card for this dumb app that doesn't even work well. Don't download this app, its a waste of storage, time, & effort.
attributes.title: don't download this
